rule.name: Prohibit Bitwise Operators
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitBitwiseOperators: Bitwise operators are usually accidentally used instead of logical boolean operators.

rule.name: Prohibit Commented Out Code
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitCommentedOutCode: Commented-out code is usually noise. It should be removed.

rule.name: Prohibit Debugging Modules
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitDebuggingModules: Prohibit loading of debugging modules like Data::Dumper

rule.name: Prohibit Flag Comments
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitFlagComments: Don't use XXX, TODO, or FIXME.

rule.name: Prohibit No Plan
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitNoPlan: Know what you're going to test.

rule.name: Prohibit Numbered Names
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitNumberedNames: Prohibit variables differentiated by trailing numbers.

rule.name: Prohibit Ref Proto Or Proto
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitRefProtoOrProto: Create a `clone()' method if you need copies of objects.

rule.name: Prohibit Useless Regex Modifiers
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitUselessRegexModifiers: Adding modifiers to a regular expression made up entirely of a variable created with qr() is usually not doing what you expect.

rule.name: Prohibit Vague Names
rule.description: Bangs::ProhibitVagueNames: Don't use generic variable names.

rule.name: Prohibit Boolean Grep
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitBooleanGrep: Use `List::MoreUtils::any' instead of `grep' in boolean context.

rule.name: Prohibit Complex Mappings
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitComplexMappings: Map blocks should have a single statement.

rule.name: Prohibit Lvalue Substr
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitLvalueSubstr: Use 4-argument `substr' instead of writing `substr($foo, 2, 6) = $bar'.

rule.name: Prohibit Reverse Sort Block
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitReverseSortBlock: Forbid $b before $a in sort blocks.

rule.name: Prohibit Sleep Via Select
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitSleepViaSelect: Use Time::HiRes instead of something like `select(undef, undef, undef, .05)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Stringy Eval
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitStringyEval: Write `eval { my $foo; bar($foo) }' instead of `eval "my $foo; bar($foo);"'.

rule.name: Prohibit Stringy Split
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitStringySplit: Write `split /-/, $string' instead of `split '-', $string'.

rule.name: Prohibit Universal Can
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitUniversalCan: Write `eval { $foo->can($name) }' instead of `UNIVERSAL::can($foo, $name)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Universal Isa
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitUniversalIsa: Write `eval { $foo->isa($pkg) }' instead of `UNIVERSAL::isa($foo, $pkg)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Useless Topic
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitUselessTopic: Don't pass $_ to built-in functions that assume it, or to most filetest operators.

rule.name: Prohibit Void Grep
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitVoidGrep: Don't use `grep' in void contexts.

rule.name: Prohibit Void Map
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::ProhibitVoidMap: Don't use `map' in void contexts.

rule.name: Require Block Grep
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::RequireBlockGrep: Write `grep { /$pattern/ } @list' instead of `grep /$pattern/, @list'.

rule.name: Require Block Map
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::RequireBlockMap: Write `map { /$pattern/ } @list' instead of `map /$pattern/, @list'.

rule.name: Require Glob Function
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::RequireGlobFunction: Use `glob q{*}' instead of <*>.

rule.name: Require Simple Sort Block
rule.description: BuiltinFunctions::RequireSimpleSortBlock: Sort blocks should have a single statement.

rule.name: Prohibit Autoloading
rule.description: ClassHierarchies::ProhibitAutoloading: AUTOLOAD methods should be avoided.

rule.name: Prohibit Explicit ISA
rule.description: ClassHierarchies::ProhibitExplicitISA: Employ `use base' instead of `@ISA'.

rule.name: Prohibit One Arg Bless
rule.description: ClassHierarchies::ProhibitOneArgBless: Write `bless {}, $class;' instead of just `bless {};'.

rule.name: Prohibit Fat Comma Newline
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitFatCommaNewline: keep a fat comma on the same line as its quoted word

rule.name: Prohibit Hard Tabs
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitHardTabs: Use spaces instead of tabs.

rule.name: Prohibit Hash Barewords
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitHashBarewords:

rule.name: Prohibit If If Same Line
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitIfIfSameLine: don't put if after if on same line

rule.name: Prohibit Parens With Builtins
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitParensWithBuiltins: Write `open $handle, $path' instead of `open($handle, $path)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Quoted Word Lists
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitQuotedWordLists: Write `qw(foo bar baz)' instead of `('foo', 'bar', 'baz')'.

rule.name: Prohibit Trailing Whitespace
rule.description: CodeLayout::ProhibitTrailingWhitespace: Don't use whitespace at the end of lines.

rule.name: Require ASCII
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireASCII: Disallow high-bit characters.

rule.name: Require Consistent Newlines
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireConsistentNewlines: Use the same newline through the source.

rule.name: Require Final Semicolon
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireFinalSemicolon: require a semicolon at the end of code blocks

rule.name: Require Tidy Code
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireTidyCode: Must run code through perltidy.

rule.name: Require Trailing Comma At Newline
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireTrailingCommaAtNewline: comma at end of list at newline

rule.name: Require Trailing Commas
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireTrailingCommas: Put a comma at the end of every multi-line list declaration, including the last one.

rule.name: Require Use UTF8
rule.description: CodeLayout::RequireUseUTF8: Require that all modules have a `use utf8;' statement.

rule.name: Constant Leading Underscore
rule.description: Compatibility::ConstantLeadingUnderscore: new enough "constant" module for leading underscores

rule.name: Constant Pragma Hash
rule.description: Compatibility::ConstantPragmaHash: new enough "constant" module for multiple constants

rule.name: Gtk2Constants
rule.description: Compatibility::Gtk2Constants: new enough Gtk2 version for its constants

rule.name: Perl Minimum Version And Why
rule.description: Compatibility::PerlMinimumVersionAndWhy: explicit Perl version for features used

rule.name: Pod Minimum Version
rule.description: Compatibility::PodMinimumVersion: check Perl version declared against POD features used

rule.name: Prohibit Three Argument Open
rule.description: Compatibility::ProhibitThreeArgumentOpen: Don't allow three-argument open unless the code uses a version of perl that supports it.

rule.name: Prohibit Unix Dev Null
rule.description: Compatibility::ProhibitUnixDevNull: don't use explicit /dev/null

rule.name: Compile Time
rule.description: CompileTime: Provide Perl::Critic support for hunting down compile-time side effects

rule.name: Prohibit CStyle For Loops
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitCStyleForLoops: Write `for(0..20)' instead of `for($i=0; $i<=20; $i++)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Cascading If Else
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitCascadingIfElse: Don't write long "if-elsif-elsif-elsif-elsif...else" chains.

rule.name: Prohibit Deep Nests
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitDeepNests: Don't write deeply nested loops and conditionals.

rule.name: Prohibit Labels With Special Block Names
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitLabelsWithSpecialBlockNames: Don't use labels that are the same as the special block names.

rule.name: Prohibit Mutating List Functions
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitMutatingListFunctions: Don't modify `$_' in list functions.

rule.name: Prohibit Negative Expressions In Unless And Until Conditions
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitNegativeExpressionsInUnlessAndUntilConditions: Don't use operators like `not', `!~', and `le' within `until' and `unless'.

rule.name: Prohibit Postfix Controls
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitPostfixControls: Write `if($condition){ do_something() }' instead of `do_something() if $condition'.

rule.name: Prohibit Unless Blocks
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitUnlessBlocks: Write `if(! $condition)' instead of `unless($condition)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Unreachable Code
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitUnreachableCode: Don't write code after an unconditional `die, exit, or next'.

rule.name: Prohibit Until Blocks
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitUntilBlocks: Write `while(! $condition)' instead of `until($condition)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Yada Operator
rule.description: ControlStructures::ProhibitYadaOperator: Never use `...' in production code.

rule.name: Prohibit Adjacent Links
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitAdjacentLinks: consecutive L<> links

rule.name: Prohibit Bad Apropos Markup
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitBadAproposMarkup: don't use C<> markup in a NAME section

rule.name: Prohibit Duplicate Headings
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitDuplicateHeadings: don't duplicate =head names

rule.name: Prohibit Duplicate See Also
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitDuplicateSeeAlso: don't duplicate L<> links in SEE ALSO

rule.name: Prohibit Link To Self
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitLinkToSelf: don't L<> link to own POD

rule.name: Prohibit Paragraph End Comma
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitParagraphEndComma: avoid comma at end of section

rule.name: Prohibit Paragraph Two Dots
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitParagraphTwoDots: don't end a paragraph with two dots

rule.name: Prohibit Unbalanced Parens
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitUnbalancedParens: don't leave an open bracket or paren

rule.name: Prohibit Verbatim Markup
rule.description: Documentation::ProhibitVerbatimMarkup: unexpanded C<> etc markup in POD verbatim paras

rule.name: Require End Before Last Pod
rule.description: Documentation::RequireEndBeforeLastPod: require __END__ before POD at end of file

rule.name: Require Filename Markup
rule.description: Documentation::RequireFilenameMarkup: markup /foo filenames

rule.name: Require Final Cut
rule.description: Documentation::RequireFinalCut: end POD with =cut directive

rule.name: Require Linked URLs
rule.description: Documentation::RequireLinkedURLs: use L<> markup on URLs in POD

rule.name: Require PODUse Encoding UTF8
rule.description: Documentation::RequirePODUseEncodingUTF8: Require that all modules that contain POD have a `=encoding utf8' declaration.

rule.name: Require Package Matches Pod Name
rule.description: Documentation::RequirePackageMatchesPodName: The `=head1 NAME' section should match the package.

rule.name: Require Pod At End
rule.description: Documentation::RequirePodAtEnd: All POD should be after `__END__'.

rule.name: Require Pod Links Include Text
rule.description: Documentation::RequirePodLinksIncludeText: Provide text to display with your pod links.

rule.name: Require Pod Sections
rule.description: Documentation::RequirePodSections: Organize your POD into the customary sections.

rule.name: Require Emacs File Variables
rule.description: Editor::RequireEmacsFileVariables: Per-file editor settings.

rule.name: Require Carping
rule.description: ErrorHandling::RequireCarping: Use functions from Carp instead of `warn' or `die'.

rule.name: Require Checking Return Value Of Eval
rule.description: ErrorHandling::RequireCheckingReturnValueOfEval: You can't depend upon the value of `$@'/`$EVAL_ERROR' to tell whether an `eval' failed.

rule.name: Require Use Of Exceptions
rule.description: ErrorHandling::RequireUseOfExceptions: Use exceptions instead of `die', `croak', or `confess'.

rule.name: Ampersand Sub Calls
rule.description: Freenode::AmpersandSubCalls: Don't use & to call subroutines

rule.name: Array Assign Aref
rule.description: Freenode::ArrayAssignAref: Don't assign an anonymous arrayref to an array

rule.name: Bareword Filehandles
rule.description: Freenode::BarewordFilehandles: Don't use bareword filehandles other than built-ins

rule.name: Conditional Declarations
rule.description: Freenode::ConditionalDeclarations: Don't declare variables conditionally

rule.name: Conditional Implicit Return
rule.description: Freenode::ConditionalImplicitReturn: Don't end a subroutine with a conditional block

rule.name: Deprecated Features
rule.description: Freenode::DeprecatedFeatures: Avoid features that have been deprecated or removed from Perl

rule.name: Discouraged Modules
rule.description: Freenode::DiscouragedModules: Various modules discouraged from use

rule.name: Dollar AB
rule.description: Freenode::DollarAB: Don't use $a or $b as variable names outside sort

rule.name: Each
rule.description: Freenode::Each: Don't use each to iterate through a hash

rule.name: Empty Return
rule.description: Freenode::EmptyReturn: Don't use return with no arguments

rule.name: Indirect Object Notation
rule.description: Freenode::IndirectObjectNotation: Don't call methods indirectly

rule.name: Mod Perl
rule.description: Freenode::ModPerl: Don't use mod_perl to write web applications

rule.name: Open Args
rule.description: Freenode::OpenArgs: Always use the three-argument form of open

rule.name: Overload Options
rule.description: Freenode::OverloadOptions: Don't use overload without specifying a bool overload and enabling fallback

rule.name: POSIXImports
rule.description: Freenode::POSIXImports: Don't use POSIX without specifying an import list

rule.name: Prototypes
rule.description: Freenode::Prototypes: Don't use function prototypes

rule.name: Strict Warnings
rule.description: Freenode::StrictWarnings: Always use strict and warnings, or a module that imports these

rule.name: Threads
rule.description: Freenode::Threads: Interpreter-based threads are officially discouraged

rule.name: Wantarray
rule.description: Freenode::Wantarray: Don't write context-sensitive functions using wantarray

rule.name: Warnings Switch
rule.description: Freenode::WarningsSwitch: Scripts should not use the -w switch on the shebang line

rule.name: While Diamond Default Assignment
rule.description: Freenode::WhileDiamondDefaultAssignment: Don't use while with implicit assignment to $_

rule.name: HTTPCookies
rule.description: HTTPCookies: Avoid using HTTP::Cookies

rule.name: Prohibit Backtick Operators
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitBacktickOperators: Discourage stuff like `@files = `ls $directory`'.

rule.name: Prohibit Bareword File Handles
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitBarewordFileHandles: Write `open my $fh, q{<}, $filename;' instead of `open FH, q{<}, $filename;'.

rule.name: Prohibit Explicit Stdin
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitExplicitStdin: Use "<>" or "<ARGV>" or a prompting module instead of "<STDIN>".

rule.name: Prohibit Interactive Test
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitInteractiveTest: Use prompt() instead of -t.

rule.name: Prohibit Joined Readline
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitJoinedReadline: Use `local $/ = undef' or Path::Tiny instead of joined readline.

rule.name: Prohibit One Arg Select
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitOneArgSelect: Never write `select($fh)'.

rule.name: Prohibit Readline In For Loop
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitReadlineInForLoop: Write `while( $line = <> ){...}' instead of `for(<>){...}'.

rule.name: Prohibit Two Arg Open
rule.description: InputOutput::ProhibitTwoArgOpen: Write `open $fh, q{<}, $filename;' instead of `open $fh, "<$filename";'.

rule.name: Require Braced File Handle With Print
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireBracedFileHandleWithPrint: Write `print {$FH} $foo, $bar;' instead of `print $FH $foo, $bar;'.

rule.name: Require Brief Open
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireBriefOpen: Close filehandles as soon as possible after opening them.

rule.name: Require Checked Close
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireCheckedClose: Write `my $error = close $fh;' instead of `close $fh;'.

rule.name: Require Checked Open
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireCheckedOpen: Write `my $error = open $fh, $mode, $filename;' instead of `open $fh, $mode, $filename;'.

rule.name: Require Checked Syscalls
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireCheckedSyscalls: Return value of flagged function ignored.

rule.name: Require Encoding With UTF8Layer
rule.description: InputOutput::RequireEncodingWithUTF8Layer: Write `open $fh, q{<:encoding(UTF-8)}, $filename;' instead of `open $fh, q{<:utf8}, $filename;'.

rule.name: Lines Not Statements
rule.description: Lax::ProhibitComplexMappings::LinesNotStatements: prohibit multiline maps, not multistatement maps

rule.name: Except As Fallback
rule.description: Lax::ProhibitEmptyQuotes::ExceptAsFallback: empty quotes are okay as the fallback on the rhs of ||

rule.name: Except Chmod
rule.description: Lax::ProhibitLeadingZeros::ExceptChmod: leading zeroes are okay as the first arg to chmod

rule.name: Except For Require
rule.description: Lax::ProhibitStringyEval::ExceptForRequire: stringy eval is bad, but it's okay just to "require"

rule.name: Except Eq
rule.description: Lax::RequireConstantOnLeftSideOfEquality::ExceptEq: constant value on the right side is ok with 'eq' NAME Perl::Critic::Policy::Lax::RequireConstantOnLeftSideOfEquality::ExceptEq - constant value on the right side is ok with 'eq'

rule.name: Require End With True Const
rule.description: Lax::RequireEndWithTrueConst: ending your package with a simple, fun true value is okay

rule.name: Except For Pragmata
rule.description: Lax::RequireExplicitPackage::ExceptForPragmata: you can put strict and warnings before "package"

rule.name: Prohibit Formats
rule.description: Miscellanea::ProhibitFormats: Do not use `format'.

rule.name: Prohibit Ties
rule.description: Miscellanea::ProhibitTies: Do not use `tie'.

rule.name: Prohibit Unrestricted No Critic
rule.description: Miscellanea::ProhibitUnrestrictedNoCritic: Forbid a bare `## no critic'

rule.name: Prohibit Useless No Critic
rule.description: Miscellanea::ProhibitUselessNoCritic: Remove ineffective "## no critic" annotations.

rule.name: Require Rcs Keywords
rule.description: Miscellanea::RequireRcsKeywords: Put source-control keywords in every file.

rule.name: Text Domain Placeholders
rule.description: Miscellanea::TextDomainPlaceholders: check placeholder names in Locale::TextDomain calls

rule.name: Text Domain Unused
rule.description: Miscellanea::TextDomainUnused: check for Locale::TextDomain imported but unused

rule.name: Perl Minimum Version
rule.description: Modules::PerlMinimumVersion: Enforce backward compatible code.

rule.name: Prohibit Automatic Exportation
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitAutomaticExportation: Export symbols via `@EXPORT_OK' or `%EXPORT_TAGS' instead of `@EXPORT'.

rule.name: Prohibit Conditional Use Statements
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitConditionalUseStatements: Avoid putting conditional logic around compile-time includes.

rule.name: Prohibit Evil Modules
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitEvilModules: Ban modules that aren't blessed by your shop.

rule.name: Prohibit Excess Main Complexity
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitExcessMainComplexity: Minimize complexity in code that is outside of subroutines.

rule.name: Prohibit Module Shebang
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitModuleShebang: don't put a #! line at the start of a module file

rule.name: Prohibit Multiple Packages
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitMultiplePackages: Put packages (especially subclasses) in separate files.

rule.name: Prohibit POSIXimport
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitPOSIXimport: don't import the whole of POSIX into a module

rule.name: Prohibit Use Quoted Version
rule.description: Modules::ProhibitUseQuotedVersion: avoid quoted version number string in a "use" statement

rule.name: Require Bareword Includes
rule.description: Modules::RequireBarewordIncludes: Write `require Module' instead of `require 'Module.pm''.

rule.name: Require End With One
rule.description: Modules::RequireEndWithOne: End each module with an explicitly `1;' instead of some funky expression.

rule.name: Require Explicit Inclusion
rule.description: Modules::RequireExplicitInclusion:

rule.name: Require Explicit Package
rule.description: Modules::RequireExplicitPackage: Always make the `package' explicit.

rule.name: Require Filename Matches Package
rule.description: Modules::RequireFilenameMatchesPackage: Package declaration must match filename.

rule.name: Require No Match Vars With Use English
rule.description: Modules::RequireNoMatchVarsWithUseEnglish: `use English' must be passed a `-no_match_vars' argument.

rule.name: Require Perl Version
rule.description: Modules::RequirePerlVersion: Require a `use 5.006;' or similar.

rule.name: Require Version Var
rule.description: Modules::RequireVersionVar: Give every module a `$VERSION' number.

rule.name: Capitalization
rule.description: NamingConventions::Capitalization: Distinguish different program components by case.

rule.name: Prohibit Ambiguous Names
rule.description: NamingConventions::ProhibitAmbiguousNames: Don't use vague variable or subroutine names like 'last' or 'record'.

rule.name: Prohibit Mixed Case Subs
rule.description: NamingConventions::ProhibitMixedCaseSubs: Write `sub my_function{}' instead of `sub MyFunction{}'.

rule.name: Prohibit Mixed Case Vars
rule.description: NamingConventions::ProhibitMixedCaseVars: Write `$my_variable = 42' instead of `$MyVariable = 42'.

rule.name: Prohibit Indirect Syntax
rule.description: Objects::ProhibitIndirectSyntax: Prohibit indirect object call syntax.

rule.name: Perlsecret
rule.description: Perlsecret: Prevent perlsecrets entering your codebase NAME Perl::Critic::Policy::Perlsecret - Prevent perlsecrets entering your codebase

rule.name: Prohibit Double Sigils
rule.description: References::ProhibitDoubleSigils: Write `@{ $array_ref }' instead of `@$array_ref'.

rule.name: Prohibit Capture Without Test
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitCaptureWithoutTest: Capture variable used outside conditional.

rule.name: Prohibit Complex Regexes
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitComplexRegexes: Split long regexps into smaller `qr//' chunks.

rule.name: Prohibit Enumerated Classes
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitEnumeratedClasses: Use named character classes instead of explicit character lists.

rule.name: Prohibit Escaped Metacharacters
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitEscapedMetacharacters: Use character classes for literal meta-characters instead of escapes.

rule.name: Prohibit Fixed String Matches
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitFixedStringMatches: Use `eq' or hash instead of fixed-pattern regexps.

rule.name: Prohibit Single Char Alternation
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitSingleCharAlternation: Use `[abc]' instead of `a|b|c'.

rule.name: Prohibit Unused Capture
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitUnusedCapture: Only use a capturing group if you plan to use the captured value.

rule.name: Prohibit Unusual Delimiters
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitUnusualDelimiters: Use only `//' or `{}' to delimit regexps.

rule.name: Prohibit Useless Topic
rule.description: RegularExpressions::ProhibitUselessTopic: Don't use $_ to match against regexes.

rule.name: Require Braces For Multiline
rule.description: RegularExpressions::RequireBracesForMultiline: Use `{' and `}' to delimit multi-line regexps.

rule.name: Require Dot Match Anything
rule.description: RegularExpressions::RequireDotMatchAnything: Always use the `/s' modifier with regular expressions.

rule.name: Require Extended Formatting
rule.description: RegularExpressions::RequireExtendedFormatting: Always use the `/x' modifier with regular expressions.

rule.name: Require Extended Formatting Except For Split
rule.description: RegularExpressions::RequireExtendedFormattingExceptForSplit: Always use the `/x' modifier with regular expressions, except when the regex is used

rule.name: Require Line Boundary Matching
rule.description: RegularExpressions::RequireLineBoundaryMatching: Always use the `/m' modifier with regular expressions.

rule.name: Prohibit Store Or Freeze
rule.description: Storable::ProhibitStoreOrFreeze: do not use store or freeze in Storable.pm

rule.name: Prohibit Ampersand Sigils
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitAmpersandSigils: Don't call functions with a leading ampersand sigil.

rule.name: Prohibit Builtin Homonyms
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitBuiltinHomonyms: Don't declare your own `open' function.

rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitExcessComplexity: Minimize complexity by factoring code into smaller subroutines.

rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitExportingUndeclaredSubs:

rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitManyArgs: Too many arguments.

rule.name: Prohibit Nested Subs
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitNestedSubs: `sub never { sub correct {} }'.

rule.name: Prohibit Qualified Sub Declarations
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitQualifiedSubDeclarations:

rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitReturnSort: Behavior of `sort' is not defined if called in scalar context.

rule.name: Prohibit Subroutine Prototypes
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitSubroutinePrototypes: Don't write `sub my_function (@@) {}'.

rule.name: Prohibit Unused Private Subroutines
rule.description: Subroutines::ProhibitUnusedPrivateSubroutines: Prevent unused private subroutines.

rule.name: Protect Private Subs
rule.description: Subroutines::ProtectPrivateSubs: Prevent access to private subs in other packages.

rule.name: Require Arg Unpacking
rule.description: Subroutines::RequireArgUnpacking: Always unpack `@_' first.

rule.name: Require Final Return
rule.description: Subroutines::RequireFinalReturn: End every path through a subroutine with an explicit `return' statement.

rule.name: Prohibit No Strict
rule.description: TestingAndDebugging::ProhibitNoStrict: Prohibit various flavors of `no strict'.

rule.name: Prohibit No Warnings
rule.description: TestingAndDebugging::ProhibitNoWarnings: Prohibit various flavors of `no warnings'.

rule.name: Prohibit Prolonged Stricture Override
rule.description: TestingAndDebugging::ProhibitProlongedStrictureOverride: Don't turn off strict for large blocks of code.

rule.name: Require Test Labels

rule.description: TestingAndDebugging::RequireUseWarnings: Always `use warnings'.

rule.description: Tics::ProhibitLongLines: 80 x 40 for life!

rule.name: Prohibit Many Arrows
rule.description: Tics::ProhibitManyArrows: (this => is => not => good)

rule.name: Prohibit Use Base

rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::NotWithCompare: logical not used with compare

rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitAccessOfPrivateData:

rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitArrayAssignAref: don't assign an anonymous arrayref to an array

rule.name: Prohibit Bareword Double Colon
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitBarewordDoubleColon: don't use Foo:: style barewords

rule.name: Prohibit Comma Separated Statements
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitCommaSeparatedStatements: Don't use the comma operator as a statement separator.

rule.name: Prohibit Complex Version
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitComplexVersion: Prohibit version values from outside the module.

rule.name: Prohibit Constant Pragma
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitConstantPragma: Don't `use constant FOO => 15'.

rule.name: Prohibit Duplicate Hash Keys
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitDuplicateHashKeys: disallow duplicate literal hash keys

rule.name: Prohibit Empty Commas
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitEmptyCommas: disallow empty consecutive commas

rule.name: Prohibit Empty Quotes
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitEmptyQuotes: Write `q{}' instead of `'''.

rule.name: Prohibit Escaped Characters
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitEscapedCharacters: Write `"\N{DELETE}"' instead of `"\x7F"', etc.

rule.name: Prohibit Filetest_f
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitFiletest_f: don't use the -f file test

rule.name: Prohibit Implicit Newlines
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitImplicitNewlines: Use concatenation or HEREDOCs instead of literal line breaks in strings.

rule.name: Prohibit Interpolation Of Literals
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitInterpolationOfLiterals: Always use single quotes for literal strings.

rule.name: Prohibit Leading Zeros
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitLeadingZeros: Write `oct(755)' instead of `0755'.

rule.name: Prohibit Long Chains Of Method Calls
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitLongChainsOfMethodCalls: Long chains of method calls indicate tightly coupled code.

rule.name: Prohibit Magic Numbers
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitMagicNumbers: Don't use values that don't explain themselves.

rule.name: Prohibit Mismatched Operators
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitMismatchedOperators: Don't mix numeric operators with string operands, or vice-versa.

rule.name: Prohibit Mixed Boolean Operators
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitMixedBooleanOperators: Write ` !$foo && $bar || $baz ' instead of ` not $foo && $bar or $baz'.

rule.name: Prohibit Noisy Quotes
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitNoisyQuotes: Use `q{}' or `qq{}' instead of quotes for awkward-looking strings.

rule.name: Prohibit Null Statements
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitNullStatements: disallow empty statements (stray semicolons)

rule.name: Prohibit Quotes As Quotelike Operator Delimiters
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitQuotesAsQuotelikeOperatorDelimiters: Don't use quotes (`'', `"', ``') as delimiters for the quote-like operators.

rule.name: Prohibit Special Literal Heredoc Terminator
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitSpecialLiteralHeredocTerminator: Don't write ` print <<'__END__' '.

rule.name: Prohibit Unknown Backslash
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitUnknownBackslash: don't use undefined backslash forms

rule.name: Prohibit Version Strings
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::ProhibitVersionStrings: Don't use strings like `v1.4' or `1.4.5' when including other modules.

rule.name: Require Constant On Left Side Of Equality
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireConstantOnLeftSideOfEquality: Putting the constant value on the left side of an equality exposes typos.

rule.name: Require Constant Version
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireConstantVersion: Require $VERSION to be a constant rather than a computed value.

rule.name: Require Interpolation Of Metachars
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireInterpolationOfMetachars: Warns that you might have used single quotes when you really wanted double-quotes.

rule.name: Require Number Separators
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireNumberSeparators: Write ` 141_234_397.0145 ' instead of ` 141234397.0145 '.

rule.name: Require Numeric Version
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireNumericVersion: $VERSION a plain number

rule.name: Require Quoted Heredoc Terminator
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireQuotedHeredocTerminator: Write ` print <<'THE_END' ' or ` print <<"THE_END" '.

rule.name: Require Upper Case Heredoc Terminator
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RequireUpperCaseHeredocTerminator: Write ` <<'THE_END'; ' instead of ` <<'theEnd'; '.

rule.name: Restrict Long Strings
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::RestrictLongStrings: Stop mixing long strings with code.

rule.name: Unexpanded Special Literal
rule.description: ValuesAndExpressions::UnexpandedSpecialLiteral: specials like __PACKAGE__ used literally

rule.name: Prohibit Augmented Assignment In Declaration
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitAugmentedAssignmentInDeclaration: Do not write ` my $foo .= 'bar'; '.

rule.name: Prohibit Conditional Declarations
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitConditionalDeclarations: Do not write ` my $foo = $bar if $baz; '.

rule.name: Prohibit Local Vars
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitLocalVars: Use `my' instead of `local', except when you have to.

rule.name: Prohibit Match Vars
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitMatchVars: Avoid `$`', `$&', `$'' and their English equivalents.

rule.name: Prohibit Package Vars
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitPackageVars: Eliminate globals declared with `our' or `use vars'.

rule.name: Prohibit Perl4Package Names
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitPerl4PackageNames: Use double colon (::) to separate package name components instead of single quotes (').

rule.name: Prohibit Punctuation Vars
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitPunctuationVars: Write `$EVAL_ERROR' instead of `$@'.

rule.name: Prohibit Reused Names
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitReusedNames: Do not reuse a variable name in a lexical scope

rule.name: Prohibit Unused Variables
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitUnusedVariables: Don't ask for storage you don't need.

rule.name: Prohibit Useless Initialization
rule.description: Variables::ProhibitUselessInitialization: prohibit superfluous initializations

rule.name: Protect Private Vars
rule.description: Variables::ProtectPrivateVars: Prevent access to private vars in other packages.

rule.name: Require Initialization For Local Vars
rule.description: Variables::RequireInitializationForLocalVars: Write `local $foo = $bar;' instead of just `local $foo;'.

rule.name: Require Lexical Loop Iterators
rule.description: Variables::RequireLexicalLoopIterators: Write `for my $element (@list) {...}' instead of `for $element (@list) {...}'.

rule.name: Require Localized Punctuation Vars
rule.description: Variables::RequireLocalizedPunctuationVars: Magic variables should be assigned as "local".

rule.name: Require Negative Indices
rule.description: Variables::RequireNegativeIndices: Negative array index should be used.
